allow: Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json nb = json.load\(sys.stdin\) for cell in nb.get\(''cells'', []\): if cell.get\(''cell_type''\) == ''code'': for output in cell.get\(''outputs'', []\): if ''text'' in output: text = ''''.join\(output.get\(''text'', []\)\) if any\(x in text.lower\(\) for x in [''accuracy'', ''precision'', ''recall'', ''f1'']\): print\(text\) print\(''---''\) ")

Bash(python3 -c " import sys, json nb = json.load\(sys.stdin\) for i, cell in enumerate\(nb.get\(''cells'', []\)\): source = ''''.join\(cell.get\(''source'', []\)\) if any\(x in source.lower\(\) for x in [''tfidfvectorizer'', ''logisticreg'', ''rfc'', ''model'', ''fit'']\): print\(f''Cell {i}: {source[:400]}''\) print\(''---''\) ")
